name: Soccer Splat
description:
Place traps to prevent the soccer player to score!

This game is made in the gamesplusjam 3!

Made in 48 hours by 3 friends!

programming - AkumiOnBass

Art - https://draconimous.itch.io/

Art - Rainsong
